scripts.demo: yarn install:all && yarn build:once && yarn demo:run
scripts.install:all: if [ ! -d ./node_modules/yarn/ ]; then npm run install:yarn; fi && yarn install
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn clean:all && yarn install && yarn build:once && yarn build:umd
scripts.bump:patch: (cd client/ && npm version patch) && (cd server/ && npm version patch) && git commit -am 'release new patch'
scripts.release:build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:once && yarn test
scripts.release:publish: (cd client/ && npm publish) && (cd server/ && npm publish)
